snippet: The Interior Ministry said Thursday that 940 cars were set on fire by vandals on New Year’s Eve, fewer than the 1,067 set aflame the previous year.
abstract: French Interior Ministry reports that vandals on New Year's Eve set fire to 940 cars, decline from previous year's total of 1,067.
lead_paragraph: The Interior Ministry said Thursday that 940 cars were set on fire by vandals on New Year’s Eve, fewer than the 1,067 set aflame the previous year.

headline.main: France: Hundreds of Cars Set on Fire
headline.print_headline: France: Hundreds of Cars Set on Fire
